ygData.subject: Re: Sharpening Rusty knives
ygData.msgSnippet: ... stones ... The closest place to get Sharpening stones, and in fact any smiting items, to Qeynos is Highpass hold.  Freeport however, has the vast majority
ygData.messageBody:
> >From: Tim Polsfoot <polsfoot@...>
> >
> >I have decided to learn a trade. I chose Blacksmithing. I fish a lot and
> >find a lot of rusty knives. I currently 'live' in Qeynos as a level 6
> >Paladin on the Prexus server. Does anyone know where to get sharping
stones
> >and the process to sharpen knives?
> >
> >Thanks in advance for any help you can give me.

The closest place to get Sharpening stones, and in fact any smiting items,
to Qeynos is Highpass hold. Freeport however, has the vast majority of
smiths, since it has everything you need for smithing.


Rob
~Chaos, panic, & disorder-my work here is done.~
